body:
Ok so after the Omega update, Avicus revoked some commands like /match, and /stats. Now I know that some commands were taken away because of the new Mojang regulations, and some because they were voted off. Just wondering if some will be added back in because I like seeing how much I killed, and my KD ratio during one match. Will there be a new /Stats, and /match. Or will this change be permanent?  

**Note I Am Not talking about the removal of prestiges, because they added in a more balanced way to get recognized for your PvP skills.

Comment down if you think they should bring back some other commands. ;:D
body_tagged:

title: Bringing Back /Stats & /Match

replies.body: I would like to see /match again, but they were probably removed because of some back-end code issues.
replies.body_tagged: I would like to see /match again, but they were probably removed because of some back-end code issues.

replies.body:
just bring back /stats and /match 

otherwise its fine
replies.body_tagged:
just bring back /stats and /match 

otherwise its fine

replies.body: I think we can look forward to seeing that soon. I don't think they were meant to be removed.
replies.body_tagged: I think we can look forward to seeing that soon. I don't think they were meant to be removed.

replies.body: well, technically we do not have stats anymore.

replies.body: Agree. But the K/D ratio is the only reason why I want it back

replies.body: Para said that /match was being worked on.

replies.body: I kinda want those in-game commands such as /match and /stats back, As well as the shop (nether star thingy) Or is it possible to buy stuff while in game?

replies.body: I think you should edit the title so it fits better to the things you want implemented. And i agree. I really want /match back. Same goes with /stats. The last mentioned command should show you the total amount of time, kills, death and credits.

replies.body: /Match had nothing to do with the EULA. /stats was removed because...well levels were gone and it had no use.
